body:
Here is a small idea as to what the community believes about re implementing the prestige feature.

So overall from this i believe the community would want this system re-adding as it gives a purpose for players to stay online, therefore raising the player count. It is something to work for in my opinion it would defiantly make me want to play more in order to rank up!
---
Here are the specific updated results with everyone's opinions aswell:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mT5IPY8lnqZ8yIdMteyJN2RXslrqJaOY4IArvDnJ770/edit?usp=sharing (live results)
Screenshot:

title: Avicus Prestige Results (42) opinions

replies.body: I cant remember the prestige feature, what was it?
replies.body_tagged: I cant remember the prestige feature, what was it?

replies.body: That's kind of a small sample size, but I do think that it wouldn't hurt to have it back.
replies.body_tagged: That's kind of a small sample size, but I do think that it wouldn't hurt to have it back.

replies.body: Before credits, kills, wins, and objectives gave XP. Once level 50 was reached, you could do /prestige to get a badge

replies.body: Yes, the same 1.5x, 2x, and 2.5x bonus applied to XP. Though it is a nice perk for premium users, I hated getting passed in the XP leaderboards by every diamond and emerald user (this was before I had temp gold).

replies.body:
I think the official statement is that Keenan does not, is unwilling to and thus will not bring back prestiges, due to the fact that adding new badges and prestiges would take a considerable amount of time to implement. 

Don't shoot me, I'm just the messenger!

replies.body: In my opinion, I really hope they get added back. When I first got on Avicus I remember the leveling/prestige system and I didn't play Avicus with it for long (about a week or 2, then I left for like a year) it was good and really does bring in some competition and something 'to work towards to'.

When I first got on Avicus I remember the leveling/prestige system and I didn't play Avicus with it for long (about a week or 2, then I left for like a year) it was good and really does bring in some competition and something 'to work towards to'.

replies.body: I loved the prestige feature. I feel like when it was still used that their were more people on. I know it definitely made me play a lot more because I wanted to level up so I could prestige. I personally think it was a great feature and it should be added back.

replies.body: Just simple prestige system pls. You get 50 prestige levels then /prestige that's all.
replies.body_tagged: Just simple prestige system pls. You get 50 prestige levels then /prestige that's all.

replies.body: I'm not so sure about the seasons. At least not every 3 months. It can take a while to get even just one Prestige. I feel like it would push people away if they almost got to one then it reset. Sure, for the people that play a lot, and are really good, they could Prestige fairly quick, but 3 months is maybe enough to Prestige twice. I wouldn't mind it like every year(?) Or just add more as time goes on. It can't be that hard to find a little symbol and put it in a line of code. Or even just make the Prestige a number, keep badges, Credits, the shop, and everything else. If it's a number then it could be infinite (I assume) and there's no reason to reset it.
replies.body_tagged: I'm not so sure about the seasons. At least not every 3 months. It can take a while to get even just one Prestige.
